mapper.select: select m.* ,t.flag as openService,CONCAT(t.time1,',',t.time2,',',t.time3,',',t.time4,',',t.time5) as serviceTimes from market_info m left join time_info t on m.smid=t.sid where m.smid=#{smid} and t.weeks=#{dw} and m.status>0
select * from market_info where name=#{name} and status>0

select count(*) from market_info where status>0
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchStr}),'%')
select smid,name from market_info where status>0

select m.* ,t.flag as openService,CONCAT(t.time1,',',t.time2,',',t.time3,',',t.time4,',',t.time5) as serviceTimes from market_info m left join time_info t on m.smid=t.sid where (m.longitude between #{minlon} and #{maxlon}) and (m.latitude between #{minlat} and #{maxlat}) and t.weeks=#{dw} and m.status>0

select distinct s.*,count(m.mid) as orderCount from market_info s join market_menu m on m.smid=s.smid where (m.longitude between #{minlon} and #{maxlon}) and (m.latitude between #{minlat} and #{maxlat}) and m.status=1 group by m.smid
